summary: Two famous competitive climbers make a bet on who can climb Cerro Torre, one of the most dangerous mountains in Argentina and the world, first. As the day of the climb approaches, their increasing competitiveness becomes destructive.
cast: Vittorio Mezzogiorno|Stefan Glowacz|Mathilda May|Al Waxman|Gunilla Karlzen|Chavela Vargas|Georg Marischka|Volker Prechtel|Hans Kammerlander|Lautaro Murúa|Brad Dourif|Donald Sutherland|Amelie Fried|Werner Herzog|Wolfgang Müller|Nicolas de la Cruz|Sebastien de la Cruz|Federico Marchesi|Tito Trevisan|Alejandro Sagrista|Mariano Rojas
title: Grito de piedra
